sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../styles/imageCard.css' import moment from 'moment' const ImageCard = (props) =>{ const image = props.image const userId = props.userId console.log(new Date().getTime(image.createdAt)) const createdTime = new Date().toDateString(image.createdAt) console.log(moment()) let thumpUpUser = false let thumpDownUser = null console.log(thumpUpUser) // check if user is authenticated to know if the user had thumped the image if(userId){ // only thumped up image is looped if(image.thumpup.thumpUpCount > 0){ thumpUpUser = image.thumpup.userActionThumpUp.find(id => id === userId) } if(image.thumpdown.thumpDownCount > 0){ thumpDownUser = image.thumpdown.userActionThumpDown.find(id => id === userId) } } return(
{image.creator.username}
{image.thumpUp.thumpUpCount}
{image.thumpDown.thumpDownCount}
{image.description}
{createdTime}
{image.category}
) } export default ImageCard
